Modules for Telescope¶

binod.magnification(t_focal, o_focal)¶

Calculates Magnification for the telescope

Parameters

  • t_focal (float) – Focal Length of the Telescope

  • o_focal (float) – Ocular Focal Length

Returns

Magnification of the telescope

Return type

float

binod.true_fov(o_diameter, t_focal_length)¶

Calulate the True Field of View

Args: o_diameter(float): Ocular field stop diameter t_focal_length(float): Telescope focal length

Returns

True Field of View

Return type

float
